BAD_REQUEST.UNGÜLTIGE_WERTE: The action was rejected by the server due to invalid values

BASIC_DATA.BEISPIELHAFTE_KONSTELLATIONEN: Exemplary constellations for contact persons in Category I
BASIC_DATA.KONTAKTPERSONEN_SIND_PERSONEN: Contact persons are persons with a contact defined below regarding a confirmed case of COVID-19. The displayed coverage horizon takes into account your information about the first appearance of symptoms, if applicable.
BASIC_DATA.MEDIZINISCHES_PERSONAL_KONTAKT: Medical staff in a room with contact to the source case e.g. In the context of care or medical examination (≤ 1.5 m) without adequate protective equipment
BASIC_DATA.MEDIZINISCHES_PERSONAL_RAUM: Medical staff in a room with a high concentration of infectious aerosols (e.g. intubation or bronchoscopy) without adequate protective equipment
BASIC_DATA.PERSONEN_DIE_MIT_HOHER_WAHRSCHEINLICHKEI: People who have a high probability of being exposed to a high concentration of infectious aerosol in the room (e.g. partying, singing together or playing sports indoors without adequate ventilation)
BASIC_DATA.PERSONEN_MIT_DIREKTEM_KONTAKT: People who have direct contact with secretions or body fluids, especially with respiratory secretions from a swelling, such as Kissing, coughing, sneezing, contact with vomit, mouth-to-mouth resuscitation, etc.
BASIC_DATA.PERSONEN_MIT_KUMULATIV: Persons with cumulative face-to-face contact with a source case for at least 15 minutes, e.g. during a conversation. These include e.g. People from the same household
BASIC_DATA.PFLICHTFELDER_SIND_MARKIERT: Required fields are marked with an *
BASIC_DATA.PLZ_UEBERPRUEFEN: Please check the zip code you entered
BASIC_DATA.SIE_HABEN_NOCH_KEINE_RELEVANTEN_KONTAKTE: You have not registered any retrospective contacts. Please confirm that you have had no relevant contact with other people in the stated period of time.
BASIC_DATA.UMGANG_MIT_KONTAKTPERSONEN: Dealing with contact persons of confirmed COVID-19 cases

CONTACT_DIALOG.MÖCHTEN_SIE_DIE_KONTAKTPERSON_JETZT_ANLE: You have named a contact who has not yet been added to your contact list. Do you want to add this contact?

CONTACT_PERSONS.HIER_KÖNNEN_SIE_PERSONEN_ERFASSEN: Here you can capture people that you can later select while recording a specific contact. In case you would like to record a specific contact instead

CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.BEKANNTE_VORERKRANKUNGEN: The contact has known underlying medical conditions
CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.BITTE_GEBEN_SIE_UNS_WEITERE_HINWEISE: Please give us further information as to how we can find this person (e.g. employee at 'Müller' bakery, taxi driver, employee in care home or hospital 'Klinikum Mannheim' and if possible corresponding telephone numbers or means of contact, such as phone number of the care home, etc.) so that we can find the contact person as quickly as possible
CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.FOLGENDE_AUSSAGEN_ÜBER_KONTAKTPERSON: Please complete the following information about the contact person
CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.FOLGENDE_VORERKRANKUNGEN: In this case the following underlying medical conditions are meant: chronic/serious heart conditions, pulmonary conditions (e.g. asthma, COPD, chronic bronchitis), chronic liver diseases, diabetes mellitus, tumors or cancer, patients with compromised immunity (incl. HIV/AIDS)
CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.MEDIZINISCHES_UMFELD: The contact person works in the medical field or as a care worker
CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.MINDESTENS_EINE_KONTAKTMÖGLICHKEIT: Please enter at least one means of contact or some form of identifying information
CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.PFLICHTEINGABEN_SIND_MARKIERT: Required fields are marked with an *
CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.WEITERE_KOMMENTARE_ODER_HINWEISE: You can enter any further comments or information for the health authority here
CONTACT_PERSON_FORM.ÜBER_60: Contact is over 60 years of age

DIARY.ALLE_ERFORDERLICHEN_EINTRÄGE_ABGESCHLOSS: You have already completed all required information
DIARY.DATENEINGABE_KONTAKT_VERGESSEN: If you forgot a contact with someone during the initial data entry, you can add this here. This refers solely to contacts made during the period before beginning electronic recording of your daily information.

DIARY_ENTRY.DIESER_EINTRAG_KANN_NICHT_MENR_BEARBEITE: This entry can no longer be edited
DIARY_ENTRY.KONTAKTE_SEIT_LETZTEM_EINTRAG: Contact with other people since last entry
DIARY_ENTRY.PFLICHTEINGABEN_SIND_MARKIERT: Required fields are marked with an *

DIARY_ENTRY_WARNING.LEIDER_HABEN_SIE_AN_DEISEM_TAG_VERPASST: Unfortunately you failed to record your data for this day. Entries can only be added for a limited period of time, as the data has already been evaluated by the health authority. Please ensure that you record your state of health and any contacts every morning and evening.

DIARY_TODAY_LIST_ITEM.ERST_AB_17_UHR: You can only enter data here after 5 pm

ERROR.KEINE_VERBINDUNG_ZUR_API: No contact could be made to the API. Please try again later
ERROR.SERVERFEHLER: Server error - for further information see console

FORBIDDEN.SIE_HABEN_NICHT_DIE_ERFORDERLICHEN_BEREC: You do not have the necessary permission for this action

FORGOTTEN_CONTACT_BANNER.FALLS_SIE_WÄHREND_DER_ANFÄNGLICHEN_DATEN: If you forgot a contact with someone during the initial data entry, you can add this here. This refers solely to contacts made during the period before beginning electronic recording of your daily information.

FORGOTTEN_CONTACT_DIALOG.PFLICHTEINGABEN_SIND_MARKIERT: Required fields are marked with an *

HD_CONTACT.SIE_BENÖTIGEN_INFORMATIONEN: Do you need further information or would you like to contact us for other reasons?
HD_CONTACT.WENN_SIE_AKUT_ÄRZTLICHE_BEHANDLUNG_BENÖT: If you need urgent medical treatment, please contact your general practitioner (GP). During the night and at weekends please contact the GP on-call service (116 117) or in severe cases the emergency room at the clinics. In case of acute emergency do not hesitate to call the ambulance service under the number 112. Before going to see your GP or going to the hospital in person, you must first call and tell them you have COVID-19 and are currently in quarantine.
HD_CONTACT.ÜBER_FOLGENDE_MÖGLICHKEITEN: You can contact your responsible local health authority as follows

HEALTH_DEPARTMENT_ADDRESS.DAS_FUER_IHRE_PLZ_ZUSTAENDIGE: The health department responsible for you does not work with Quarano. Please contact your health department directly.

INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.BEHANDELNDEN_HAUSARZT: Please enter the name of your general practitioner
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.HABEN_SIE_BEREITS: Have you already noticed characteristic symptoms of COVID-19?
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.IN_DIESEM_FALL_SIND_DAS: In this case the following underlying medical conditions are meant: chronic/serious heart conditions, pulmonary conditions (e.g. asthma, COPD, chronic bronchitis), chronic liver diseases, diabetes mellitus, tumors or cancer, patients with compromised immunity (incl. HIV/AIDS)
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.KONTAKT_ZU_RISIKOPERSONEN: Have you had any contact with people at risk?
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.MEDIZINISCHES_UMFELD: Do you work in the medical field or as a care worker?
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.ORT_DER_ANSTECKUNG: Please tell us where and when you were (probably) infected
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.VORERKRANKUNGEN: Do you have any relevant underlying conditions?
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.WANN_HABEN_SIE_DIE_ERSTEN_SYMPTOME: When did you first notice symptoms?
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.WELCHE_VORERKRANKUNGEN: Which underlying conditions do you have?
INITIAL_QUESTIONNAIRE_FORM.WIE_UND_ZU_WEM_KONTAKT: To whom have you had contact and in what form?

LANDING.AKUT_ÄRZTLICHE_BEHANDLUNG: If you need urgent medical treatment, please contact your general practitioner (GP). During the night and at weekends please contact the GP on-call service (116 117) or in severe cases the emergency room at the clinics. In case of acute emergency do not hesitate to call the ambulance service under the number 112. Before going to see your GP or going to the hospital in person, you must first call and tell them you have COVID-19 and are currently in quarantine.
LANDING.BEI_FRAGEN: If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. If you have general questions about Corona, please call Mannheim's Corona-Hotline under the phone number
LANDING.BEI_FRAGEN_ALS_KONTAKTPERSON: For particular questions about yourself as a contact person, please call the hotline for contact persons under the phone number
LANDING.DEM_ONLINE_DOKUMENTATIONSTOOL: the online documentation tool for your local health authority!
LANDING.DIESER_LINK: This link is for your personal use only. If several affected people are living together in one household, it is important that each person registers as a separate user with their own personalized access link from the health authority. In this way, all the information entered can be correlated accurately.
LANDING.IHRE_STAMMDATEN_SIND_NUR_EINMAL_EINZUGEB: You only need to enter your basic personal information once. Contacts and possible symptoms should be recorded twice daily.
LANDING.REGISTRIEREN_SIE_SICH: Register with a user name and your choice of password. You can then use this information to log in and use quarano
LANDING.SIE_HABEN_VOM_GESUNDHEITSAMT: You have received a personalized registration link from the Gesundheitsamt Mannheim. On the following pages you can log in and use the application. By using the application you can support the Gesundheitsamt and do your part to ensure that fast action can be taken.

LOCATION_FORM.NAME: Name

PASSWORD_RESET.GEBEN_SIE_HIER: Almost there. Now choose your new password. For security reasons, we also need your user name and your date of birth so that we can compare them with the information in your user account.

REGISTER.REGISTRIERUNG_ERFOLGREICH: Registration successful. You will automatically be logged in
REGISTER.SIE_KÖNNEN_SICH_NICHT_REGISTRIEREN: You can only register for quarano if you agree to the privacy policy. If not, please contact your responsible local health authority immediately.
REGISTER.WENN_SIE_VON_IHRER_ZUSTÄNDIGEN_BEHÖRDE: If you were contacted by your responsible health authority in order to record your symptoms online you can register here

VALIDATION.ALPHABETIC: This field can only contain alphabetic characters
VALIDATION.ALPHANUMERIC: This field can only contain alphanumeric characters
VALIDATION.CITY: Please enter a valid town name. This can contain letters and the following characters: . - ( ) /
VALIDATION.CODE_INVALID: The code you have entered is not valid
VALIDATION.DIGIT: This field must contain at least one digit
VALIDATION.EMAIL: Please enter a valid e-mail address
VALIDATION.EXT_REFERENCE_NUMBER: The reference number you have entered contains illegal characters. Reference numbers may consist only of numbers, letters, hyphens and underscores
VALIDATION.HOUSE_NUMBER: Please enter a valid house number. This may be a maximum of 15 characters long and consist only of letters, numbers, periods, hyphens and slashes
VALIDATION.INTEGER_UNSIGNED: This field may only contain numbers
VALIDATION.MAXLENGTH: This field may only contain a maximum of {{value}} characters
VALIDATION.MINLENGTH: This field must contain at least {{value}} characters
VALIDATION.MIN_LENGTH_ARRAY: Please select at least one element
VALIDATION.NAME: Please enter a valid name. This may consist only of letters, spaces and hyphens
VALIDATION.NON_WORD_CHAR: This field must contain at least one of the following characters: : @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) , . ? : | & < >
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_CONFIRM_WRONG: Password and confirmation must be identical
VALIDATION.PASSWORD_INCLUDES_USERNAME: The password may not contain the user name
VALIDATION.PHONE_NUMBER: Please enter a valid phone number. This may consist of numbers, +, -, brackets or spaces
VALIDATION.STREET: Please enter a valid street name. This may consist of letters, numbers, spaces, periods and hyphens
VALIDATION.TEXTUAL: This field may contain only letters, numbers, punctuation marks and line breaks
VALIDATION.UPPERCASE: This field must contain at least one upper case letter
VALIDATION.USERNAME: Please enter a valid user name. This may consist of letters, numbers, hyphens or underscores
VALIDATION.USERNAME_INVALID: The user name you have entered cannot be used
VALIDATION.ZIP: Please enter a valid 5-digit zip/postal code

WELCOME.PFLEGEN_SIE: Record any symptoms and your body temperature in your diary twice a day.
WELCOME.SEHEN_SIE_INDEXFÄLLE: View and process all open index cases in your health department here. Create new cases and use the contact function.
WELCOME.SEHEN_SIE_KONTAKTPERSONEN: View and edit all open contact persons in your health department here. Create new cases and use the contact function.
WELCOME.VERWALTEN_SIE: Manage your personal contacts so that you can quickly and easily reference them in the diary entries without having to re-enter them.
